GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/healthcheck.description: serves a response to show the server is online

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics
GET /api/topics.format: Object with a key of topics and value as an array of topic objects

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles
GET /api/articles.format: Object with a key of articles and value as an array of article objects

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Searches for a specific article by article_id
GET /api/articles/:article_id.format: Object with a key of article{id} and value as object with article information
